title: Bayer's Kerendia/SGLT2 combo exceeds expectations, with more expansion ahead: pharma chief
author: Angus Liu
description: Bayer's heart and kidney disease drug Kerendia is considered a rival to well-established SGLT2 diabetes meds. | Bayer's heart and kidney disease drug Kerendia is considered a rival to well-established SGLT2 diabetes meds. But after new data showed the two types of medicines can work together, the German company is getting even more bullish about Kerendia's potential.
